page.name: Clouded Deathgem
page.description: This powerful staff is topped with a cloudy gem being grasped tightly by two skeletal hands. It is said that ancient mages once gazed through the gem to the time of their own demise.

properties.name: Clouded Deathgem
properties.description: This powerful staff is topped with a cloudy gem being grasped tightly by two skeletal hands. It is said that ancient mages once gazed through the gem to the time of their own demise.

page.name: Race To the KeyGems
page.description: You find yourself in the hidden catacombs beneath the Willowshire Guardian Tower, racing against the minions of the dragon Gorgok to one of four magical keygems.
